Package de.aikiit.spamprotector

Base package of this tool, contains the application as applet or standalone.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Converter Main interface to define spam replacement strategies.
 

Class Summary
AntiSpamApplet Main class that starts an applet with the main UI component.
AntiSpamApplication Application starter class to perform local testing.
AsciiConverter Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
GUI This class contains the main UI of this application (both input windows and all command buttons).
 

Package de.aikiit.spamprotector Description

Base package of this tool, contains the application as applet or standalone.
